about_the_game:
ReVen: XBridge Soundtrack. An exciting blend of orchestration meets electronic chip tunes. Comes with 34 high quality mp3s. Composed by Mark McLemore.



Track List:

01.Intro
02.Adagio
03.Triumph
04.XBridge Overture
05.Delta Prime
06.Beyond the Deep
07.Sea of Stars
08.Space Pirate
09.Rebirth
10.Space Rush
11.Quantum Space
12.Titan Encountered
13.Voyage
14.Enter the EGR
15.Galactic Battle
16.Enter Syrek
17.Home Base
18.The XBuilder
19.The Sacrifice
20.It Watches you
21.It knows You're Near
22.It is coming for you
23.Mission Complete
24.Mission Results
25.Arcade-Digital Warefare
26.Arcade-Quantum Space
27.Arcade-Galactic Battle
28.Arcade-Space Ranger
29.Arcade-Mega Ship
30.Arcade-Space Rush
31.Arcade-Accelatron
32.Arcade-Game Over
33.Arcade-eVe's Lament
34.Arcade-XBridge Overture

name: ReVen: XBridge Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHZ Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: This game requires an internet connection to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Nvidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual-core processor or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers, at least 512 MB of dedicated video memory and support for OpenGL 2.0+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game requires an internet connection to play.

short_description: ReVen: XBridge Soundtrack. An exciting blend of orchestration meets electronic chip tunes. Comes with 34 high quality mp3s. Composed by Mark McLemore.
